code: import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL=new URL("https://6458c2d48badff578efa0261.mockapi.io/api/v1/users");export function getTweets(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/?&page=").concat(page,"&limit=3")).then(function(response){return response;}).then(function(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return data;}).catch(console.error);}export function addFollower(id,followers){return axios.put("".concat(BASE_URL,"/").concat(id),{followers:followers}).then(function(_ref2){var data=_ref2.data;return data;}).catch(console.error);}
